comments.content: If your stupid enough to leave your young child unattended while they are swimming and come back to find them like this you seriously do not deserve to be a parent. How stupid can people be really? Smdh
WTF WHY show the video!!...still images would have been just as clear as showing a child strugling on a video! Some things should NOT be shared. A really pissed of parent.  üò†

To everyone saying this shouldn't be shown. After watching this clip will you leave your child unattended in one of these floatation devices? Or will you be extra careful and protective? There is a lesson to be learned here.

This was in China, the child went to hospital and is recovering. The two people were possibly his parent's but reports are saying it might have been the swimming centre's staff. So dangerous and stupid to leave him there by himself and to be outside with their back to him.
Omg, this was so so close!  You can literally see life disappearing from him  üò®  and just when his legs stop moving they finally get him out. Geez.  Hopefully hes alright

This video should be labeled as a possible "trigger warning" and the video itself should be put in the comments area. There may be parents/family membets who have lost a child to accidental drowning and seeing this video may be traumatizing to them. No ... See More

Some people need to think about the dangers of their actions that involve a baby or young child, when did it ever seem a good idea to leave a baby in a swimming pool unattended in a inflatable support ring or not? Some people need to use their brain and a feel sorry for the baby as he had complete muppets supposedly looking after him. Brain is a powerful thing, use it don't abuse it. Tools.

üò°  who in their right mind leave any child unattended in water how ever deep! Looking at the footage it was caught on cctv, why wasn't that monitored? This is so wrong on so many levels and makes me sick to the stomach this poor innocent child is left unattended for SO long  üò° üò° üò°

This happened when i was a lifeguard years ago.  Eas watching the kid who was too big to be in the seat, had a feeling he was going to dive in.  He did and the ring flipped, luckily i was already halfway off the chair to get him out so was  under for less than 5 seconds.  His parents were too busy with the smaller child to notice.  Very scary for the parents, but it was definately a learning curve.

I couldn't hold myself from crying. During the video i was begging god to send someone to take the baby out of the pool, thankfully he did , but i hope the baby didn't get any chronical damage or something.
Yes Tracy this is it shocking you don't  take your eyes of a small child in the pool and shfe is only a baby one of the parents should have been in the water with her xx

A few years ago I was at the baby pool at our community pool and a toddler that had on a life jacket was face down and it was obvious he couldn't get his head up out of the water. I went over and pulled him out while the adults with him sit over at the edge of the pool chatting not noticing the child in trouble or that I had pulled him out. It can happen anywhere! Be careful with your children.

To all you perfect parents out there keep in mind that there are stupid parents out there that need to be shown this video because they lack common sense. This video needs to be shared everywhere! It shows how fast it can happen, how quiet a drowning struggle is and how unsafe these flotation devices are.

Whoever took this video and did not drop everything and help this child should be arrested for child abuse! This is unbelievable that the parents didn't stay with him and a person vidoed this and did not even try to help him! Worse than terrible!
I found out The young boy was taken to hospital where he is recovering, according to The Mirror. But we can only imagine with horror what a few seconds more could have done.

Poor little kid.... the parents don't deserve that little one ! Who in their right mind would leave a child of that age unattended ! Fucking idiots ! ..... I just hope the child survived .... very upsetting
Parents or whoever was looking after this poor we boy should be charged with neglect, you never leave young children in water no mater how long it's for.

Good message !!!!! but why did the women recording this not do something they are watching it on a monitor videoing it on their phone having a calm conversation and now their video is famous please put down your camera and HELP a child if you ever see this
I hope they took the boy to the doctor. Even though he seems okay he probably has water still in his lungs. He's at risk for what they call dry drowning.
This happened to me as a kid but with one of those life jacket belts hate them air floats all the way for me also don't think he will be unharmed fear of water at the least
He was not "unharmed". It's called near drowning and it kills as many people as actual drowning does. Not to mention the fact that he was terrified! Unharmed, indeed......  üòí
this video is bloody awful and I didnt even watch all of it!! This should not be shared! Parents know the dangers and dont need to see this!!!
Emma Cetinich   Isabel Angulo   Brittney Jade   Its sad what happened to the little boy but reminds me of wet n wild

I can't believe this is being passed around the internet.  The people who need to see it don't give rats ass. The people who don't need to see it, would never leave their child unattended in this situation.  What the hell has the world come to when this is considered entertainment, under the guise of a warning.  Assholes.
People! An inflatable ring is not a life preserver! Don't leave your child alone in the water! Not even a bath tub!  üò°  use common sense!

I have seen lot of crazy post but for some reason this struck a chord in my soul and I must say something!!!This is a sad day when a f'n person would stand there and watch a child drown....(because they know it will go virual)...This person needs to vi ... See More

Why, why, why!!! This flotation devices are not babysitters! This baby shouldn't of ever been left alone, no child in that matter. He could have died, I hope he was evaluated for dry drowning as well. I pray He make a full recovery.

Such a heartbreaking thing to watch! I felt so helpless that I couldn't help that baby. It infuriated me to the point I was screaming at the screen....somebody help that poor baby! I honestly thought he was gone....my gosh what the hell is wrong with ppl????
I'm happy this video was shown.  It brings about keen awareness and is a harsh reminder to NEVER under any circumstances should we leave a child unattended!
Not sure y in the hell someone would want to share this just to watch a child drown. I understand   u want parents to watch out for the safety of there kids but this is really to much
I didn't really want to share this photo as I am extremely upset by it, but it goes to show never leave children on their own at all. He is in hospital.  üò± üò™ üò™

God this makes me want to cry because you can just see the life drain from him and they get him out just as his legs stop kicking about, it infuriates me too because the parents just left him playing there without thinking that maybe he'll flip over, f ... See More
Jail time I hope...who in the right mind filmed it and did nothing.....the fact its on someone's phone and they did nothing to help they're just as bad....jail time also

For christs sake, all you judgemental keyboard warriors. This is horrifying to watch. Absolutely avoidable. But how many of you have taken your eyes off your child for just one whole minute. Think about it. One minute I see parents taking more than tha ... See More

Wtf... dumb fkn idiots.. They do not deserve to be parents.... Why show this?? My heart is breaking for this boy... What the hell are people thinking sharing and passing this around... We as parents knows the dangers and aren't that fkn stupid... I'm sorry about my language but this video really upset me!
Since it is caught on camera, who the hell was watching on the other end of the camera????
Omg is he ok I can't stop thinking is he ok? Made me sick n only caught a second of it couldn't watch! Why would anyone want to just want to know this child is ok!!!!!!!!!
These "parents" need to be charged with child endangerment!!
This does not need to be spread. This is gratuitous and traumatizing to watch. You call this news? Disgraceful.

The MOST disturbing thing here is that SOMEONE IS MANNING THE "HIDDEN" CAMERA!!! THE CAMERA WAS MOVED TOWARD THE LEFT SIDE AROUND 58 -60 SECONDS INTO THE VIDEO, WHEN THE CHILD WAS SLIGHTLY OUT OF VIEW!!! SOMEONE APPEARS TO BE WATCHING THE WHOLE TIME AS THE CAMERA IS MOVING!!!!!!!
This is why you can never leave your kids unattended , no matter where , up to a certain age of course
Helen  remember we were at the pool and this happened for 2 seconds? Scared me shitless!
How fricken stupid never ever ever leave a child alone in or near water ffs how dumb are parent's
Y the hell  would u leave or put a baby in a pool alone .really omg.so many stupid people about.
This happened to me and you didn't it  Kirstyleigh Pickering  when we was both on in the massive ring in America with r legs in it , luckily we was big enough and old enough to get out xx
Please tell me this boy is alright (no dry drowning) and that the parents are charged and that child's in better care. This video literally made me sick to my stomach who can do that like seriously
What about the person filming this? This child could have died, but yet, they are filming vs getting him out!
Who calmly videos this and does nothing - parents where wrong to leave child alone. Person feeling it acceptable to record it and do nothing they are worse.
What parent would leave a small child in  a pool or bath anyway  it's common sense
This actually happened to me when I was younger!!! And I was at a public pool and no one helped. Scariest moment of my life  üòì
